verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi And it came to pass כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- when זָקֵ֣ן <S%H2204><s%> za-Ken was old יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak, that when Isaac וַתִּכְהֶ֥יןָ <S%H3543><s%> vat-tich-Hei-na were dim עֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nav and his eyes מֵרְאֹ֑ת <S%H7200><s%> me-re-'Ot; so that he could not see וַיִּקְרָ֞א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra he called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵשָׂ֣ו׀ <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav Esau בְּנ֣וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No son הַגָּדֹ֗ל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol, his eldest וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him בְּנִ֔י <S%H1121><s%> be-Ni, unto him My son וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he said אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Ne-ni. Here

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> hin-neh- Behold נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> na now זָקַ֑נְתִּי <S%H2204><s%> za-Kan-ti; Behold now I am old לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יָדַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti I know י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom not the day מוֹתִֽי׃ <S%H4194><s%> mo-Ti. of my death

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now שָׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> sa- Now therefore take נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> na please כֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H3627><s%> che-Lei-cha, I pray thee thy weapons תֶּלְיְךָ֖ <S%H8522><s%> tel-ye-Cha thy quiver וְקַשְׁתֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7198><s%> ve-kash-Te-cha; and thy bow וְצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> ve-Tze and go out הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh, to the field וְצ֥וּדָה <S%H6679><s%> ve-Tzu-dah and take לִּ֖י li ; צֵידָה tzei-dah כצָֽיִד׃ <S%H6720><s%> Tza-yid. meat ק

וַעֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-seh- And make לִ֨י li מַטְעַמִּ֜ים <S%H4303><s%> mat-'am-Mim me savoury meat כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher such as אָהַ֛בְתִּי <S%H157><s%> 'a-Hav-ti I love וְהָבִ֥יאָה <S%H935><s%> ve-ha-Vi-'ah and bring לִּ֖י li וְאֹכֵ֑לָה <S%H398><s%> ve-'o-Che-lah; [it] to me that I may eat בַּעֲב֛וּר <S%H5668><s%> ba-'a-Vur so תְּבָרֶכְךָ֥ <S%H1288><s%> te-va-rech-Cha may bless נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi that my soul בְּטֶ֥רֶם <S%H2962><s%> be-Te-rem thee before אָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> 'a-Mut. I die

וְרִבְקָ֣ה <S%H7259><s%> ve-riv-Kah And Rebekah שֹׁמַ֔עַת <S%H8085><s%> sho-Ma-'at, heard בְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> be-dab-Ber spake יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak, when Isaac אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav to Esau בְּנ֑וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No; his son וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went עֵשָׂו֙ <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav And Esau הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh, to the field לָצ֥וּד <S%H6679><s%> la-Tzud to hunt צַ֖יִד <S%H6718><s%> Tza-yid [for] venison לְהָבִֽיא׃ <S%H935><s%> le-ha-Vi. [and] to bring

וְרִבְקָה֙ <S%H7259><s%> ve-riv-Kah And Rebekah אָֽמְרָ֔ה <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Rah, spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about יַעֲקֹ֥ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko unto Jacob בְּנָ֖הּ <S%H1121><s%> be-Nah her son לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ti Behold I heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha, thy father מְדַבֵּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> me-dab-Ber speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about עֵשָׂ֥ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav unto Esau אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha thy brother לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

הָבִ֨יאָה <S%H935><s%> ha-Vi-'ah Bring לִּ֥י li צַ֛יִד <S%H6718><s%> Tza-yid me venison וַעֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-seh- and make לִ֥י li מַטְעַמִּ֖ים <S%H4303><s%> mat-'am-Mim me savoury meat וְאֹכֵ֑לָה <S%H398><s%> ve-'o-Che-lah; that I may eat וַאֲבָרֶכְכָ֛ה <S%H1288><s%> va-'a-va-rech-Chah and bless לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei thee before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before מוֹתִֽי׃ <S%H4194><s%> mo-Ti. my death

וְעַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now בְנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> ve-Ni Now therefore my son שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> she-Ma' obey בְּקֹלִ֑י <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Li; my voice לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> la-'a-Sher according to that which אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I מְצַוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-Vah I command אֹתָֽךְ׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tach.

לֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> lech- Go נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> na now אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon, now to the flock וְקַֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> ve-kach- and fetch לִ֣י li מִשָּׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham, there שְׁנֵ֛י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei me from thence two גְּדָיֵ֥י <S%H1423><s%> ge-da-Yei kids עִזִּ֖ים <S%H5795><s%> 'iz-Zim of the goats טֹבִ֑ים <S%H2896><s%> to-Vim; good וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'e-'e-Seh and I will make אֹתָ֧ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam מַטְעַמִּ֛ים <S%H4303><s%> mat-'am-Mim them savoury meat לְאָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> le-'a-Vi-cha for thy father כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he אָהֵֽב׃ <S%H157><s%> 'a-Hev. such as he loveth

וְהֵבֵאתָ֥ <S%H935><s%> ve-he-ve-Ta And thou shalt bring לְאָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> le-'a-Vi-cha [it] to thy father וְאָכָ֑ל <S%H398><s%> ve-'a-Chal; that he may eat בַּעֲבֻ֛ר <S%H5668><s%> ba-'a-Vur so אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher and that יְבָרֶכְךָ֖ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-rech-Cha he may bless לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei thee before מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4194><s%> mo-To. his death

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, And Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about רִבְקָ֖ה <S%H7259><s%> riv-Kah to Rebekah אִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo; his mother הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> hen Behold עֵשָׂ֤ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav Behold Esau אָחִי֙ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi my brother אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man שָׂעִ֔ר <S%H8163><s%> sa-'Ir, [is] a hairy וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi I אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man חָלָֽק׃ <S%H2509><s%> cha-Lak. and I [am] a smooth

אוּלַ֤י <S%H194><s%> 'u-Lai Perhaps יְמֻשֵּׁ֙נִי֙ <S%H4959><s%> ye-mush-She-ni peradventure will feel אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi, My father וְהָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yi-ti become בְעֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Nav me and I shall seem כִּמְתַעְתֵּ֑עַ <S%H8591><s%> kim-ta'-Te-a'; to him as a deceiver וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <S%H935><s%> ve-he-ve-Ti and I shall bring עָלַ֛י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai upon קְלָלָ֖ה <S%H7045><s%> ke-la-Lah a curse וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and not בְרָכָֽה׃ <S%H1293><s%> ve-ra-Chah. upon me and not a blessing

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said לוֹ֙ lo אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo, And his mother עָלַ֥י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai unto קִלְלָתְךָ֖ <S%H7045><s%> kil-la-te-Cha unto him Upon me [be] thy curse בְּנִ֑י <S%H1121><s%> be-Ni; my son אַ֛ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach only שְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> she-Ma' only obey בְּקֹלִ֖י <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Li my voice וְלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ve-Lech and go קַֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> kach- fetch לִֽי׃ Li.

וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went וַיִּקַּ֔ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach, and fetched וַיָּבֵ֖א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve and brought לְאִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> le-'im-Mo; [them] to his mother וַתַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vat-Ta-'as made אִמּוֹ֙ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo and his mother מַטְעַמִּ֔ים <S%H4303><s%> mat-'am-Mim, savoury meat כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after אָהֵ֥ב <S%H157><s%> 'a-Hev loved אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv. such as his father

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> vat-tik-Kach took רִ֠בְקָה <S%H7259><s%> Riv-kah And Rebekah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בִּגְדֵ֨י <S%H899><s%> big-Dei raiment עֵשָׂ֜ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav Esau בְּנָ֤הּ <S%H1121><s%> be-Nah son הַגָּדֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol of her eldest הַחֲמֻדֹ֔ת <S%H2532><s%> ha-cha-mu-Dot, goodly אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אִתָּ֖הּ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tah her in בַּבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> bab-Ba-yit; which [were] with her in the house וַתַּלְבֵּ֥שׁ <S%H3847><s%> vat-tal-Besh and put them upon אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob בְּנָ֥הּ <S%H1121><s%> be-Nah son הַקָּטָֽן׃ <S%H6996><s%> hak-ka-Tan. her younger

וְאֵ֗ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et, עֹרֹת֙ <S%H5785><s%> 'o-Rot the skins גְּדָיֵ֣י <S%H1423><s%> ge-da-Yei of the kids הָֽעִזִּ֔ים <S%H5795><s%> ha-'iz-Zim, of the goats הִלְבִּ֖ישָׁה <S%H3847><s%> hil-Bi-shah And she put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on יָדָ֑יו <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dav; upon his hands וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and on חֶלְקַ֥ת <S%H2513><s%> chel-Kat and upon the smooth צַוָּארָֽיו׃ <S%H6677><s%> tzav-va-Rav. of his neck

וַתִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> vat-tit-Ten And she gave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמַּטְעַמִּ֛ים <S%H4303><s%> ham-mat-'am-Mim the savoury meat וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַלֶּ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> hal-Le-chem and the bread אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֑תָה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sa-tah; which she had prepared בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad into the hand יַעֲקֹ֥ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob בְּנָֽהּ׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-Nah. of her son

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo And he came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv unto his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi; My father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he said הִנֶּ֔נִּי <S%H2009><s%> hin-Nen-ni, Here מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi I am Who אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you בְּנִֽי׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-Ni. afflicted

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his אָבִ֗יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv, unto his father אָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I עֵשָׂ֣ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav I [am] Esau בְּכֹרֶ֔ךָ <S%H1060><s%> be-cho-Re-cha, thy firstborn עָשִׂ֕יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti I have done כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher you דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ta according as thou badest אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; about קֽוּם־ <S%H6965><s%> kum- me arise נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> na please שְׁבָ֗ה <S%H3427><s%> she-Vah, I pray thee sit וְאָכְלָה֙ <S%H398><s%> ve-'a-che-Lah and eat מִצֵּידִ֔י <S%H6718><s%> mitz-tzei-Di, of my venison בַּעֲב֖וּר <S%H5668><s%> ba-'a-Vur that תְּבָרֲכַ֥נִּי <S%H1288><s%> te-va-ra-Chan-ni may bless נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-She-cha. that thy soul

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יִצְחָק֙ <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak And Isaac אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No, unto his son מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- How זֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh he מִהַ֥רְתָּ <S%H4116><s%> mi-Har-ta [it] so quickly לִמְצֹ֖א <S%H4672><s%> lim-Tzo How [is it] that thou hast found בְּנִ֑י <S%H1121><s%> be-Ni; to his son וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because הִקְרָ֛ה <S%H7136><s%> hik-Rah brought יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Because the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God לְפָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai. [it] to me
